title: Brad Brownell (Radwood, Flatsixes.com, Jalopnik, and more!)
description:
Brad Brownell is one of the busiest people in the automotive circle. He's a co-founder of Radwood and writes for more publications than we can count. Instead of flying to press events, he drives a yellow Porsche 912E, sometimes for thousands of miles at a time. We call him a glutton for punishment but he couldn't be happier. We talk about his recent motorcycle reviews, crashing, advanced dirt riding, what Harley is up to, upcoming Radwood events, and his new project, Autotopia2099.

 

Want to sell your rad car? Go to http://www.Radforsale.com  and enter Code: tubular, for a free listing!

 

 

Head to Policygenius.com to get started right now. They’ve saved shoppers up to $1,055 per year over what they were paying for home & auto insurance.

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Bradley Brownell, Brad Brownell)
